item.title: My Hugo Experience
item.description: What is Hugo? Link to heading To make this website, I have chosen to do it with Hugo. Hugo is a tool that allows you to automatically generate HTML/CSS/JavaScript code from a Markdown specification and a configuration file. Why Hugo? Link to heading The reason is quite simple, I wanted to start a personal website as a side project, but dislike writing HTML/CSS/JavaScript ‘code’. Thus, I chose to use a tool like Hugo, since it makes the task of formatting web content trivial.
